page.title: 11A POLICE ADVENTURE
page.content: One night P.C Calvert and P.C Novakowsky were passing the Little Ouseburn church when they saw a van with three ladders . They went back and saw the van had gone .P.C Calvert saw three shadows on the church roof . "Come down !" but nothing happened . "Police come down !". P.C Novakowsky was scared !. They both said "lets go home there is no-one here ". They hid behind a grave stone. The robbers thinking they had gone came down from the roof with the lead . P.C Novakowsky jumped on one and had a fight . P.C Calvert radioed the chief for more men .When the police van came they put the robbers in and took them to prison .
